lyrics:
9 contributorsbroken youth lyricsintro
whats left to say that hasnt been already said before
did i ever have a purpose i cant feel it anymore
if ignorance is happiness please steal me from my head
cause the voices once so soothing make me feel so fucking so fucking dead

verse 1
id give anything for something to feel anything at all
it just seems so goddamn meaningless it all seems so devolved
were drowning in irrelevance were hiding from the truth
we are the numb complacent we are the broken youth

we come undone we are the ugly truth

bridge
i cant stop i cant stop
medicated sedated in the back seat of our lives
its so fucking hard to swallow will we make it out alive
i cant stop i cant stop
